description.value:
The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save wis 16 format=long]] or become &Reference[frightened]{frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} uses one of the following breath weapons.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} exhales &Reference[fire]{fire} in an 60-foot &Reference[line]{line} that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that &Reference[line]{line} must make a [[/save dex 18 format=long]], taking [[/damage 13d6 type=fire average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} exhales sleep gas in a 60-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save con 18 format=long]] or fall &Reference[unconscious]{unconscious} for 10 minutes. This effect ends for a creature if the creature takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Lair Actions

On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects:

  • A strong wind blows around the &Reference[dragon]{dragon}. Each creature within 60 feet of the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} must succeed on a [[/save str 15 format=long]] or be pushed 15 feet away from the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} and knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. Gases and vapors are dispersed by the wind, and unprotected flames are extinguished. Protected flames, such as lanterns, have a 50 percent chance of being extinguished.
  • A cloud of sand swirls about in a 20-foot-radius &Reference[sphere]{sphere} centered on a point the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can see within 120 feet of it. The cloud spreads around corners. Each creature in it must succeed on a [[/save con 15 format=long]] or be &Reference[blinded]{blinded} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Regional Effects

The region containing a legendary brass dragons lair is warped by the dragons magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

  • Tracks appear in the sand within 6 miles of the dragons lair. The tracks lead to safe shelters and hidden water sources, while also leading away from areas that the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} prefers to remain undisturbed.
  • Images of Large or smaller monsters haunt the desert sands within 1 mile of the dragons lair. These illusions move and appear real, although they can do no harm. A creature that examines an image from a distance can tell its an &Reference[ill]{illusion} with a successful DC 20 &Reference[int]{Intelligence} (&Reference[inv]{Investigation}) check. Any physical interaction with an image reveals it to be an &Reference[ill]{illusion}, because objects pass through it.
  • Whenever a creature with an &Reference[int]{Intelligence} of 3 or higher comes within 30 feet of a water source within 1 mile of the dragons lair, the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} becomes aware of the creatures presence and location.

If the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} dies, the tracks fade in 1d10 days, but the other effects fade immediately.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

A Brass Dragons Lair

A brass dragons desert lair is typically a ruin, canyon, or cave network with ceiling holes to allow for sunlight.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Detect. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} makes a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) check.

Tail Attack. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} makes a tail attack.

Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions). The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} must succeed on a [[/save dex 19 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d6 + 6 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can then fly up to half its flying speed.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} makes a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) check.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} must succeed on a [[/save dex 19 format=long]] or take [[/damage 2d6 + 6 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can then fly up to half its flying speed.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Legendary Resistance (3/Day). If the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
